jobDescription: DescriptionMake Next Happen Now.  Silicon Valley Bank's internship program is designed for undergraduates to gain real life experiences with a financial services company that helps entrepreneur's and enterprising companies succeed by offering diversified and complementary financial services to technology and life science companies, venture capital/private equity firms, and premium wineries. Our internships are learning opportunities for students to receive practical professional experience for their future occupation or profession.  The characteristics that the candidate must possess: Passion for the startup community & venture capital industryArticulate (both in writing and presenting)Takes initiativeHard workerHigh-energy with a sense of humorHealthy curiosity and ambition The responsibilities of the CVC team intern will include: Directly reporting to the group's managing directorsIndustry research and data analysisPreparing and building internal and external presentations & thought piecesSupport for client meetings and eventsRepresenting the CVC team and SVB brand within the marketQualificationsCandidate should have a minimum GPA of 3.5Seeking the following Majors: open to all majorsSeeking UndergradPreferred candidates should have work or academic experience with the following: financial modeling, research, sales, analytics, capital and public markets, understanding of VC economics and corporate innovation trends
